news.description: I am finishing up on an eight year project on the South Shore.  Many built-ins and a variety of woods, stone, ceramic and glass.  A fun project not without it's challenges and problems. As I finish up this project, I am designing, building and installing a series of book shelf units for a condo in Brookline.
New potential work for the fall includes a collaboration on a restaurant interior and an update of a kitchen in a South End condo.
Kitchen Condo in the South End never happened, Restaurant 99% complete:  Deluxe Depot Diner in Framingham, check out their website for images.
